00089 static int seq_watermark_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00090 {
00091         seq_printf(m, LPU64"\n", *(__u64 *)m->private);
00092         return 0;
00093 }
00094 
00095 static ssize_t seq_watermark_write(struct file *file,
00096                                    const char __user *buffer, size_t count,
00097                                    loff_t *off)
00098 {
00099         __s64 value;
00100         __u64 watermark;
00101         __u64 *data = ((struct seq_file *)file->private_data)->private;
00102         bool wm_low = (data == &ldlm_reclaim_threshold_mb) ? true : false;
00103         int rc;
00104 
00105         rc = lprocfs_str_with_units_to_s64(buffer, count, &value, 'M');
00106         if (rc) {
00107                 CERROR("Failed to set %s, rc = %d.\n",
00108                        wm_low ? "lock_reclaim_threshold_mb" : "lock_limit_mb",
00109                        rc);
00110                 return rc;
00111         } else if (value != 0 && value < (1 << 20)) {
00112                 CERROR("%s should be greater than 1MB.\n",
00113                        wm_low ? "lock_reclaim_threshold_mb" : "lock_limit_mb");
00114                 return -EINVAL;
00115         }
00116         watermark = value >> 20;
00117 
00118         if (wm_low) {
00119                 if (ldlm_lock_limit_mb != 0 && watermark > ldlm_lock_limit_mb) {
00120                         CERROR("lock_reclaim_threshold_mb must be smaller than "
00121                                "lock_limit_mb.\n");
00122                         return -EINVAL;
00123                 }
00124 
00125                 *data = watermark;
00126                 if (watermark != 0) {
00127                         watermark <<= 20;
00128                         do_div(watermark, sizeof(struct ldlm_lock));
00129                 }
00130                 ldlm_reclaim_threshold = watermark;
00131         } else {
00132                 if (ldlm_reclaim_threshold_mb != 0 &&
00133                     watermark < ldlm_reclaim_threshold_mb) {
00134                         CERROR("lock_limit_mb must be greater than "
00135                                "lock_reclaim_threshold_mb.\n");
00136                         return -EINVAL;
00137                 }
00138 
00139                 *data = watermark;
00140                 if (watermark != 0) {
00141                         watermark <<= 20;
00142                         do_div(watermark, sizeof(struct ldlm_lock));
00143                 }
00144                 ldlm_lock_limit = watermark;
00145         }
00146 
00147         return count;
00148 }
00149 
00150 static int seq_watermark_open(struct inode *inode, struct file *file)
00151 {
00152         return single_open(file, seq_watermark_show, PDE_DATA(inode));
00153 }
00154 
00155 static const struct file_operations ldlm_watermark_fops = {
00156         .owner          = THIS_MODULE,
00157         .open           = seq_watermark_open,
00158         .read           = seq_read,
00159         .write          = seq_watermark_write,
00160         .llseek         = seq_lseek,
00161         .release        = lprocfs_single_release,
00162 };

00164 static int seq_granted_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00165 {
00166         seq_printf(m, LPU64"\n", percpu_counter_sum_positive(
00167                    (struct percpu_counter *)m->private));
00168         return 0;
00169 }
00170 
00171 static int seq_granted_open(struct inode *inode, struct file *file)
00172 {
00173         return single_open(file, seq_granted_show, PDE_DATA(inode));
00174 }

00176 static const struct file_operations ldlm_granted_fops = {
00177         .owner  = THIS_MODULE,
00178         .open   = seq_granted_open,
00179         .read   = seq_read,
00180         .llseek = seq_lseek,
00181         .release = seq_release,
00182 };

00185 
00186 int ldlm_proc_setup(void)
00187 {
00188         int rc;
00189         struct lprocfs_vars list[] = {
00190                 { .name =       "dump_namespaces",
00191                   .fops =       &ldlm_dump_ns_fops,
00192                   .proc_mode =  0222 },
00193                 { .name =       "dump_granted_max",
00194                   .fops =       &ldlm_rw_uint_fops,
00195                   .data =       &ldlm_dump_granted_max },
00196                 { .name =       "cancel_unused_locks_before_replay",
00197                   .fops =       &ldlm_rw_uint_fops,
00198                   .data =       &ldlm_cancel_unused_locks_before_replay },
00199 #ifdef HAVE_SERVER_SUPPORT
00200                 { .name =       "lock_reclaim_threshold_mb",
00201                   .fops =       &ldlm_watermark_fops,
00202                   .data =       &ldlm_reclaim_threshold_mb },
00203                 { .name =       "lock_limit_mb",
00204                   .fops =       &ldlm_watermark_fops,
00205                   .data =       &ldlm_lock_limit_mb },
00206                 { .name =       "lock_granted_count",
00207                   .fops =       &ldlm_granted_fops,
00208                   .data =       &ldlm_granted_total },
00209 #endif
00210                 { NULL }};
00211         ENTRY;
00212         LASSERT(ldlm_ns_proc_dir == NULL);
00213 
00214         ldlm_type_proc_dir = lprocfs_register(OBD_LDLM_DEVICENAME,
00215                                               proc_lustre_root,
00216                                               NULL, NULL);
00217         if (IS_ERR(ldlm_type_proc_dir)) {
00218                 CERROR("LProcFS failed in ldlm-init\n");
00219                 rc = PTR_ERR(ldlm_type_proc_dir);
00220                 GOTO(err, rc);
00221         }
00222 
00223         ldlm_ns_proc_dir = lprocfs_register("namespaces",
00224                                             ldlm_type_proc_dir,
00225                                             NULL, NULL);
00226         if (IS_ERR(ldlm_ns_proc_dir)) {
00227                 CERROR("LProcFS failed in ldlm-init\n");
00228                 rc = PTR_ERR(ldlm_ns_proc_dir);
00229                 GOTO(err_type, rc);
00230         }
00231 
00232         ldlm_svc_proc_dir = lprocfs_register("services",
00233                                              ldlm_type_proc_dir,
00234                                              NULL, NULL);
00235         if (IS_ERR(ldlm_svc_proc_dir)) {
00236                 CERROR("LProcFS failed in ldlm-init\n");
00237                 rc = PTR_ERR(ldlm_svc_proc_dir);
00238                 GOTO(err_ns, rc);
00239         }
00240 
00241         rc = lprocfs_add_vars(ldlm_type_proc_dir, list, NULL);
00242         if (rc != 0) {
00243                 CERROR("LProcFS failed in ldlm-init\n");
00244                 GOTO(err_svc, rc);
00245         }
00246 
00247         RETURN(0);
00248 
00249 err_svc:
00250         lprocfs_remove(&ldlm_svc_proc_dir);
00251 err_ns:
00252         lprocfs_remove(&ldlm_ns_proc_dir);
00253 err_type:
00254         lprocfs_remove(&ldlm_type_proc_dir);
00255 err:
00256         ldlm_svc_proc_dir = NULL;
00257         RETURN(rc);
00258 }
00259 
00260 void ldlm_proc_cleanup(void)
00261 {
00262         if (ldlm_svc_proc_dir)
00263                 lprocfs_remove(&ldlm_svc_proc_dir);
00264 
00265         if (ldlm_ns_proc_dir)
00266                 lprocfs_remove(&ldlm_ns_proc_dir);
00267 
00268         if (ldlm_type_proc_dir)
00269                 lprocfs_remove(&ldlm_type_proc_dir);
00270 }
00271 
00272 static int lprocfs_ns_resources_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00273 {
00274         struct ldlm_namespace   *ns  = m->private;
00275         __u64                   res = 0;
00276         struct cfs_hash_bd              bd;
00277         int                     i;
00278 
00279         /* result is not strictly consistant */
00280         cfs_hash_for_each_bucket(ns->ns_rs_hash, &bd, i)
00281                 res += cfs_hash_bd_count_get(&bd);
00282         return lprocfs_u64_seq_show(m, &res);
00283 }
00284 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(lprocfs_ns_resources);
00285 
00286 static int lprocfs_ns_locks_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00287 {
00288         struct ldlm_namespace   *ns = m->private;
00289         __u64                   locks;
00290 
00291         locks = lprocfs_stats_collector(ns->ns_stats, LDLM_NSS_LOCKS,
00292                                         LPROCFS_FIELDS_FLAGS_SUM);
00293         return lprocfs_u64_seq_show(m, &locks);
00294 }
00295 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(lprocfs_ns_locks);
00296 
00297 static int lprocfs_lru_size_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00298 {
00299         struct ldlm_namespace *ns = m->private;
00300         __u32 *nr = &ns->ns_max_unused;
00301 
00302         if (ns_connect_lru_resize(ns))
00303                 nr = &ns->ns_nr_unused;
00304         return lprocfs_uint_seq_show(m, nr);
00305 }
00306 
00307 static ssize_t lprocfs_lru_size_seq_write(struct file *file,
00308                                           const char __user *buffer,
00309                                           size_t count, loff_t *off)
00310 {
00311         struct ldlm_namespace *ns = ((struct seq_file *)file->private_data)->private;
00312         char dummy[MAX_STRING_SIZE + 1], *end;
00313         unsigned long tmp;
00314         int lru_resize;
00315 
00316         dummy[MAX_STRING_SIZE] = '\0';
00317         if (copy_from_user(dummy, buffer, MAX_STRING_SIZE))
00318                 return -EFAULT;
00319 
00320         if (strncmp(dummy, "clear", 5) == 0) {
00321                 CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE,
00322                        "dropping all unused locks from namespace %s\n",
00323                        ldlm_ns_name(ns));
00324                 if (ns_connect_lru_resize(ns)) {
00325                         int canceled, unused  = ns->ns_nr_unused;
00326 
00327                         /* Try to cancel all @ns_nr_unused locks. */
00328                         canceled = ldlm_cancel_lru(ns, unused, 0,
00329                                                    LDLM_LRU_FLAG_PASSED);
00330                         if (canceled < unused) {
00331                                 CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE,
00332                                        "not all requested locks are canceled, "
00333                                        "requested: %d, canceled: %d\n", unused,
00334                                        canceled);
00335                                 return -EINVAL;
00336                         }
00337                 } else {
00338                         tmp = ns->ns_max_unused;
00339                         ns->ns_max_unused = 0;
00340                         ldlm_cancel_lru(ns, 0, 0, LDLM_LRU_FLAG_PASSED);
00341                         ns->ns_max_unused = tmp;
00342                 }
00343                 return count;
00344         }
00345 
00346         tmp = simple_strtoul(dummy, &end, 0);
00347         if (dummy == end) {
00348                 CERROR("invalid value written\n");
00349                 return -EINVAL;
00350         }
00351         lru_resize = (tmp == 0);
00352 
00353         if (ns_connect_lru_resize(ns)) {
00354                 if (!lru_resize)
00355                         ns->ns_max_unused = tmp;
00356 
00357                 if (tmp > ns->ns_nr_unused)
00358                         tmp = ns->ns_nr_unused;
00359                 tmp = ns->ns_nr_unused - tmp;
00360 
00361                 CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE,
00362                        "changing namespace %s unused locks from %u to %u\n",
00363                        ldlm_ns_name(ns), ns->ns_nr_unused,
00364                        (unsigned int)tmp);
00365                 ldlm_cancel_lru(ns, tmp, LCF_ASYNC, LDLM_LRU_FLAG_PASSED);
00366 
00367                 if (!lru_resize) {
00368                         CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE,
00369                                "disable lru_resize for namespace %s\n",
00370                                ldlm_ns_name(ns));
00371                         ns->ns_connect_flags &= ~OBD_CONNECT_LRU_RESIZE;
00372                 }
00373         } else {
00374                 CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE,
00375                        "changing namespace %s max_unused from %u to %u\n",
00376                        ldlm_ns_name(ns), ns->ns_max_unused,
00377                        (unsigned int)tmp);
00378                 ns->ns_max_unused = (unsigned int)tmp;
00379                 ldlm_cancel_lru(ns, 0, LCF_ASYNC, LDLM_LRU_FLAG_PASSED);
00380 
00381                 /* Make sure that LRU resize was originally supported before
00382                  * turning it on here. */
00383                 if (lru_resize &&
00384                     (ns->ns_orig_connect_flags & OBD_CONNECT_LRU_RESIZE)) {
00385                         CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE,
00386                                "enable lru_resize for namespace %s\n",
00387                                ldlm_ns_name(ns));
00388                         ns->ns_connect_flags |= OBD_CONNECT_LRU_RESIZE;
00389                 }
00390         }
00391 
00392         return count;
00393 }
00394 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(lprocfs_lru_size);
00395 
00396 static int lprocfs_elc_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00397 {
00398         struct ldlm_namespace *ns = m->private;
00399         unsigned int supp = ns_connect_cancelset(ns);
00400 
00401         return lprocfs_uint_seq_show(m, &supp);
00402 }
00403 
00404 static ssize_t lprocfs_elc_seq_write(struct file *file,
00405                                      const char __user *buffer,
00406                                      size_t count, loff_t *off)
00407 {
00408         struct ldlm_namespace *ns = ((struct seq_file *)file->private_data)->private;
00409         unsigned int supp = -1;
00410         int rc;
00411 
00412         rc = lprocfs_wr_uint(file, buffer, count, &supp);
00413         if (rc < 0)
00414                 return rc;
00415 
00416         if (supp == 0)
00417                 ns->ns_connect_flags &= ~OBD_CONNECT_CANCELSET;
00418         else if (ns->ns_orig_connect_flags & OBD_CONNECT_CANCELSET)
00419                 ns->ns_connect_flags |= OBD_CONNECT_CANCELSET;
00420         return count;
00421 }
00422 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(lprocfs_elc);
00423 
00424 static void ldlm_namespace_proc_unregister(struct ldlm_namespace *ns)
00425 {
00426         if (ns->ns_proc_dir_entry == NULL)
00427                 CERROR("dlm namespace %s has no procfs dir?\n",
00428                        ldlm_ns_name(ns));
00429         else
00430                 lprocfs_remove(&ns->ns_proc_dir_entry);
00431 
00432         if (ns->ns_stats != NULL)
00433                 lprocfs_free_stats(&ns->ns_stats);
00434 }
00435 
00436 static int ldlm_namespace_proc_register(struct ldlm_namespace *ns)
00437 {
00438         struct lprocfs_vars lock_vars[2];
00439         char lock_name[MAX_STRING_SIZE + 1];
00440         struct proc_dir_entry *ns_pde;
00441 
00442         LASSERT(ns != NULL);
00443         LASSERT(ns->ns_rs_hash != NULL);
00444 
00445         if (ns->ns_proc_dir_entry != NULL) {
00446                 ns_pde = ns->ns_proc_dir_entry;
00447         } else {
00448                 ns_pde = proc_mkdir(ldlm_ns_name(ns), ldlm_ns_proc_dir);
00449                 if (ns_pde == NULL)
00450                         return -ENOMEM;
00451                 ns->ns_proc_dir_entry = ns_pde;
00452         }
00453 
00454         ns->ns_stats = lprocfs_alloc_stats(LDLM_NSS_LAST, 0);
00455         if (ns->ns_stats == NULL)
00456                 return -ENOMEM;
00457 
00458         lprocfs_counter_init(ns->ns_stats, LDLM_NSS_LOCKS,
00459                              LPROCFS_CNTR_AVGMINMAX, "locks", "locks");
00460 
00461         lock_name[MAX_STRING_SIZE] = '\0';
00462 
00463         memset(lock_vars, 0, sizeof(lock_vars));
00464         lock_vars[0].name = lock_name;
00465 
00466         ldlm_add_var(&lock_vars[0], ns_pde, "resource_count", ns,
00467                      &lprocfs_ns_resources_fops);
00468         ldlm_add_var(&lock_vars[0], ns_pde, "lock_count", ns,
00469                      &lprocfs_ns_locks_fops);
00470 
00471         if (ns_is_client(ns)) {
00472                 ldlm_add_var(&lock_vars[0], ns_pde, "lock_unused_count",
00473                              &ns->ns_nr_unused, &ldlm_uint_fops);
00474                 ldlm_add_var(&lock_vars[0], ns_pde, "lru_size", ns,
00475                              &lprocfs_lru_size_fops);
00476                 ldlm_add_var(&lock_vars[0], ns_pde, "lru_max_age",
00477                              &ns->ns_max_age, &ldlm_rw_uint_fops);
00478                 ldlm_add_var(&lock_vars[0], ns_pde, "early_lock_cancel",
00479                              ns, &lprocfs_elc_fops);
00480         } else {
00481                 ldlm_add_var(&lock_vars[0], ns_pde, "ctime_age_limit",
00482                              &ns->ns_ctime_age_limit, &ldlm_rw_uint_fops);
00483                 ldlm_add_var(&lock_vars[0], ns_pde, "lock_timeouts",
00484                              &ns->ns_timeouts, &ldlm_uint_fops);
00485                 ldlm_add_var(&lock_vars[0], ns_pde, "max_nolock_bytes",
00486                              &ns->ns_max_nolock_size, &ldlm_rw_uint_fops);
00487                 ldlm_add_var(&lock_vars[0], ns_pde, "contention_seconds",
00488                              &ns->ns_contention_time, &ldlm_rw_uint_fops);
00489                 ldlm_add_var(&lock_vars[0], ns_pde, "contended_locks",
00490                              &ns->ns_contended_locks, &ldlm_rw_uint_fops);
00491                 ldlm_add_var(&lock_vars[0], ns_pde, "max_parallel_ast",
00492                              &ns->ns_max_parallel_ast, &ldlm_rw_uint_fops);
00493         }
00494         return 0;
00495 }
00496 #undef MAX_STRING_SIZE
00497 #else /* CONFIG_PROC_FS */
00498 
00499 #define ldlm_namespace_proc_unregister(ns)      ({;})
00500 #define ldlm_namespace_proc_register(ns)        ({0;})
00501 
00502 #endif /* CONFIG_PROC_FS */
00503 
00504 static unsigned ldlm_res_hop_hash(struct cfs_hash *hs,
00505                                   const void *key, unsigned mask)
00506 {
00507         const struct ldlm_res_id     *id  = key;
00508         unsigned                val = 0;
00509         unsigned                i;
00510 
00511         for (i = 0; i < RES_NAME_SIZE; i++)
00512                 val += id->name[i];
00513         return val & mask;
00514 }
00515 
00516 static unsigned ldlm_res_hop_fid_hash(struct cfs_hash *hs,
00517                                       const void *key, unsigned mask)
00518 {
00519         const struct ldlm_res_id *id = key;
00520         struct lu_fid       fid;
00521         __u32               hash;
00522         __u32               val;
00523 
00524         fid.f_seq = id->name[LUSTRE_RES_ID_SEQ_OFF];
00525         fid.f_oid = (__u32)id->name[LUSTRE_RES_ID_VER_OID_OFF];
00526         fid.f_ver = (__u32)(id->name[LUSTRE_RES_ID_VER_OID_OFF] >> 32);
00527 
00528         hash = fid_flatten32(&fid);
00529         hash += (hash >> 4) + (hash << 12); /* mixing oid and seq */
00530         if (id->name[LUSTRE_RES_ID_HSH_OFF] != 0) {
00531                 val = id->name[LUSTRE_RES_ID_HSH_OFF];
00532                 hash += (val >> 5) + (val << 11);
00533         } else {
00534                 val = fid_oid(&fid);
00535         }
00536         hash = hash_long(hash, hs->hs_bkt_bits);
00537         /* give me another random factor */
00538         hash -= hash_long((unsigned long)hs, val % 11 + 3);
00539 
00540         hash <<= hs->hs_cur_bits - hs->hs_bkt_bits;
00541         hash |= ldlm_res_hop_hash(hs, key, CFS_HASH_NBKT(hs) - 1);
00542 
00543         return hash & mask;
00544 }
00545 
00546 static void *ldlm_res_hop_key(struct hlist_node *hnode)
00547 {
00548         struct ldlm_resource   *res;
00549 
00550         res = hlist_entry(hnode, struct ldlm_resource, lr_hash);
00551         return &res->lr_name;
00552 }
00553 
00554 static int ldlm_res_hop_keycmp(const void *key, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00555 {
00556         struct ldlm_resource   *res;
00557 
00558         res = hlist_entry(hnode, struct ldlm_resource, lr_hash);
00559         return ldlm_res_eq((const struct ldlm_res_id *)key,
00560                            (const struct ldlm_res_id *)&res->lr_name);
00561 }
00562 
00563 static void *ldlm_res_hop_object(struct hlist_node *hnode)
00564 {
00565         return hlist_entry(hnode, struct ldlm_resource, lr_hash);
00566 }
00567 
00568 static void
00569 ldlm_res_hop_get_locked(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00570 {
00571         struct ldlm_resource *res;
00572 
00573         res = hlist_entry(hnode, struct ldlm_resource, lr_hash);
00574         ldlm_resource_getref(res);
00575 }
00576 
00577 static void ldlm_res_hop_put(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct hlist_node *hnode)
00578 {
00579         struct ldlm_resource *res;
00580 
00581         res = hlist_entry(hnode, struct ldlm_resource, lr_hash);
00582         ldlm_resource_putref(res);
00583 }
00584 
00585 static struct cfs_hash_ops ldlm_ns_hash_ops = {
00586         .hs_hash        = ldlm_res_hop_hash,
00587         .hs_key         = ldlm_res_hop_key,
00588         .hs_keycmp      = ldlm_res_hop_keycmp,
00589         .hs_keycpy      = NULL,
00590         .hs_object      = ldlm_res_hop_object,
00591         .hs_get         = ldlm_res_hop_get_locked,
00592         .hs_put         = ldlm_res_hop_put
00593 };
00594 
00595 static struct cfs_hash_ops ldlm_ns_fid_hash_ops = {
00596         .hs_hash        = ldlm_res_hop_fid_hash,
00597         .hs_key         = ldlm_res_hop_key,
00598         .hs_keycmp      = ldlm_res_hop_keycmp,
00599         .hs_keycpy      = NULL,
00600         .hs_object      = ldlm_res_hop_object,
00601         .hs_get         = ldlm_res_hop_get_locked,
00602         .hs_put         = ldlm_res_hop_put
00603 };
00604 
00605 typedef struct ldlm_ns_hash_def {
00606         enum ldlm_ns_type       nsd_type;
00608         unsigned                nsd_bkt_bits;
00610         unsigned                nsd_all_bits;
00612         struct cfs_hash_ops *nsd_hops;
00613 } ldlm_ns_hash_def_t;
00614 
00615 static struct ldlm_ns_hash_def ldlm_ns_hash_defs[] =
00616 {
00617         {
00618                 .nsd_type       = LDLM_NS_TYPE_MDC,
00619                 .nsd_bkt_bits   = 11,
00620                 .nsd_all_bits   = 16,
00621                 .nsd_hops       = &ldlm_ns_fid_hash_ops,
00622         },
00623         {
00624                 .nsd_type       = LDLM_NS_TYPE_MDT,
00625                 .nsd_bkt_bits   = 14,
00626                 .nsd_all_bits   = 21,
00627                 .nsd_hops       = &ldlm_ns_fid_hash_ops,
00628         },
00629         {
00630                 .nsd_type       = LDLM_NS_TYPE_OSC,
00631                 .nsd_bkt_bits   = 8,
00632                 .nsd_all_bits   = 12,
00633                 .nsd_hops       = &ldlm_ns_hash_ops,
00634         },
00635         {
00636                 .nsd_type       = LDLM_NS_TYPE_OST,
00637                 .nsd_bkt_bits   = 11,
00638                 .nsd_all_bits   = 17,
00639                 .nsd_hops       = &ldlm_ns_hash_ops,
00640         },
00641         {
00642                 .nsd_type       = LDLM_NS_TYPE_MGC,
00643                 .nsd_bkt_bits   = 4,
00644                 .nsd_all_bits   = 4,
00645                 .nsd_hops       = &ldlm_ns_hash_ops,
00646         },
00647         {
00648                 .nsd_type       = LDLM_NS_TYPE_MGT,
00649                 .nsd_bkt_bits   = 4,
00650                 .nsd_all_bits   = 4,
00651                 .nsd_hops       = &ldlm_ns_hash_ops,
00652         },
00653         {
00654                 .nsd_type       = LDLM_NS_TYPE_UNKNOWN,
00655         },
00656 };
00657 
00661 struct ldlm_namespace *ldlm_namespace_new(struct obd_device *obd, char *name,
00662                                           enum ldlm_side client,
00663                                           enum ldlm_appetite apt,
00664                                           enum ldlm_ns_type ns_type)
00665 {
00666         struct ldlm_namespace *ns = NULL;
00667         struct ldlm_ns_bucket *nsb;
00668         struct ldlm_ns_hash_def *nsd;
00669         struct cfs_hash_bd bd;
00670         int idx;
00671         int rc;
00672         ENTRY;
00673 
00674         LASSERT(obd != NULL);
00675 
00676         rc = ldlm_get_ref();
00677         if (rc) {
00678                 CERROR("ldlm_get_ref failed: %d\n", rc);
00679                 RETURN(NULL);
00680         }
00681 
00682         for (idx = 0;;idx++) {
00683                 nsd = &ldlm_ns_hash_defs[idx];
00684                 if (nsd->nsd_type == LDLM_NS_TYPE_UNKNOWN) {
00685                         CERROR("Unknown type %d for ns %s\n", ns_type, name);
00686                         GOTO(out_ref, NULL);
00687                 }
00688 
00689                 if (nsd->nsd_type == ns_type)
00690                         break;
00691         }
00692 
00693         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(ns);
00694         if (!ns)
00695                 GOTO(out_ref, NULL);
00696 
00697         ns->ns_rs_hash = cfs_hash_create(name,
00698                                          nsd->nsd_all_bits, nsd->nsd_all_bits,
00699                                          nsd->nsd_bkt_bits, sizeof(*nsb),
00700                                          CFS_HASH_MIN_THETA,
00701                                          CFS_HASH_MAX_THETA,
00702                                          nsd->nsd_hops,
00703                                          CFS_HASH_DEPTH |
00704                                          CFS_HASH_BIGNAME |
00705                                          CFS_HASH_SPIN_BKTLOCK |
00706                                          CFS_HASH_NO_ITEMREF);
00707         if (ns->ns_rs_hash == NULL)
00708                 GOTO(out_ns, NULL);
00709 
00710         cfs_hash_for_each_bucket(ns->ns_rs_hash, &bd, idx) {
00711                 nsb = cfs_hash_bd_extra_get(ns->ns_rs_hash, &bd);
00712                 at_init(&nsb->nsb_at_estimate, ldlm_enqueue_min, 0);
00713                 nsb->nsb_namespace = ns;
00714                 nsb->nsb_reclaim_start = 0;
00715         }
00716 
00717         ns->ns_obd      = obd;
00718         ns->ns_appetite = apt;
00719         ns->ns_client   = client;
00720 
00721         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ns->ns_list_chain);
00722         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&ns->ns_unused_list);
00723         spin_lock_init(&ns->ns_lock);
00724         atomic_set(&ns->ns_bref, 0);
00725         init_waitqueue_head(&ns->ns_waitq);
00726 
00727         ns->ns_max_nolock_size    = NS_DEFAULT_MAX_NOLOCK_BYTES;
00728         ns->ns_contention_time    = NS_DEFAULT_CONTENTION_SECONDS;
00729         ns->ns_contended_locks    = NS_DEFAULT_CONTENDED_LOCKS;
00730 
00731         ns->ns_max_parallel_ast   = LDLM_DEFAULT_PARALLEL_AST_LIMIT;
00732         ns->ns_nr_unused          = 0;
00733         ns->ns_max_unused         = LDLM_DEFAULT_LRU_SIZE;
00734         ns->ns_max_age            = LDLM_DEFAULT_MAX_ALIVE;
00735         ns->ns_ctime_age_limit    = LDLM_CTIME_AGE_LIMIT;
00736         ns->ns_timeouts           = 0;
00737         ns->ns_orig_connect_flags = 0;
00738         ns->ns_connect_flags      = 0;
00739         ns->ns_stopping           = 0;
00740         ns->ns_reclaim_start      = 0;
00741         rc = ldlm_namespace_proc_register(ns);
00742         if (rc != 0) {
00743                 CERROR("Can't initialize ns proc, rc %d\n", rc);
00744                 GOTO(out_hash, rc);
00745         }
00746 
00747         idx = ldlm_namespace_nr_read(client);
00748         rc = ldlm_pool_init(&ns->ns_pool, ns, idx, client);
00749         if (rc) {
00750                 CERROR("Can't initialize lock pool, rc %d\n", rc);
00751                 GOTO(out_proc, rc);
00752         }
00753 
00754         ldlm_namespace_register(ns, client);
00755         RETURN(ns);
00756 out_proc:
00757         ldlm_namespace_proc_unregister(ns);
00758         ldlm_namespace_cleanup(ns, 0);
00759 out_hash:
00760         cfs_hash_putref(ns->ns_rs_hash);
00761 out_ns:
00762         OBD_FREE_PTR(ns);
00763 out_ref:
00764         ldlm_put_ref();
00765         RETURN(NULL);
00766 }
00767 EXPORT_SYMBOL(ldlm_namespace_new);
00768 
00769 extern struct ldlm_lock *ldlm_lock_get(struct ldlm_lock *lock);
00770 
00779 static void cleanup_resource(struct ldlm_resource *res, struct list_head *q,
00780                              __u64 flags)
00781 {
00782         struct list_head *tmp;
00783         int rc = 0, client = ns_is_client(ldlm_res_to_ns(res));
00784         bool local_only = !!(flags & LDLM_FL_LOCAL_ONLY);
00785 
00786         do {
00787                 struct ldlm_lock *lock = NULL;
00788 
00789                 /* First, we look for non-cleaned-yet lock
00790                  * all cleaned locks are marked by CLEANED flag. */
00791                 lock_res(res);
00792                 list_for_each(tmp, q) {
00793                         lock = list_entry(tmp, struct ldlm_lock,
00794                                           l_res_link);
00795                         if (ldlm_is_cleaned(lock)) {
00796                                 lock = NULL;
00797                                 continue;
00798                         }
00799                         LDLM_LOCK_GET(lock);
00800                         ldlm_set_cleaned(lock);
00801                         break;
00802                 }
00803 
00804                 if (lock == NULL) {
00805                         unlock_res(res);
00806                         break;
00807                 }
00808 
00809                 /* Set CBPENDING so nothing in the cancellation path
00810                  * can match this lock. */
00811                 ldlm_set_cbpending(lock);
00812                 ldlm_set_failed(lock);
00813                 lock->l_flags |= flags;
00814 
00815                 /* ... without sending a CANCEL message for local_only. */
00816                 if (local_only)
00817                         ldlm_set_local_only(lock);
00818 
00819                 if (local_only && (lock->l_readers || lock->l_writers)) {
00820                         /* This is a little bit gross, but much better than the
00821                          * alternative: pretend that we got a blocking AST from
00822                          * the server, so that when the lock is decref'd, it
00823                          * will go away ... */
00824                         unlock_res(res);
00825                         LDLM_DEBUG(lock, "setting FL_LOCAL_ONLY");
00826                         if (lock->l_flags & LDLM_FL_FAIL_LOC) {
00827                                 set_current_state(TASK_UNINTERRUPTIBLE);
00828                                 schedule_timeout(cfs_time_seconds(4));
00829                                 set_current_state(TASK_RUNNING);
00830                         }
00831                         if (lock->l_completion_ast)
00832                                 lock->l_completion_ast(lock,
00833                                                        LDLM_FL_FAILED, NULL);
00834                         LDLM_LOCK_RELEASE(lock);
00835                         continue;
00836                 }
00837 
00838                 if (client) {
00839                         struct lustre_handle lockh;
00840 
00841                         unlock_res(res);
00842                         ldlm_lock2handle(lock, &lockh);
00843                         rc = ldlm_cli_cancel(&lockh, LCF_LOCAL);
00844                         if (rc)
00845                                 CERROR("ldlm_cli_cancel: %d\n", rc);
00846                 } else {
00847                         unlock_res(res);
00848                         LDLM_DEBUG(lock, "Freeing a lock still held by a "
00849                                    "client node");
00850                         ldlm_lock_cancel(lock);
00851                 }
00852                 LDLM_LOCK_RELEASE(lock);
00853         } while (1);
00854 }
00855 
00856 static int ldlm_resource_clean(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00857                                struct hlist_node *hnode, void *arg)
00858 {
00859         struct ldlm_resource *res = cfs_hash_object(hs, hnode);
00860         __u64 flags = *(__u64 *)arg;
00861 
00862         cleanup_resource(res, &res->lr_granted, flags);
00863         cleanup_resource(res, &res->lr_converting, flags);
00864         cleanup_resource(res, &res->lr_waiting, flags);
00865 
00866         return 0;
00867 }
00868 
00869 static int ldlm_resource_complain(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
00870                                   struct hlist_node *hnode, void *arg)
00871 {
00872         struct ldlm_resource  *res = cfs_hash_object(hs, hnode);
00873 
00874         lock_res(res);
00875         CERROR("%s: namespace resource "DLDLMRES" (%p) refcount nonzero "
00876                "(%d) after lock cleanup; forcing cleanup.\n",
00877                ldlm_ns_name(ldlm_res_to_ns(res)), PLDLMRES(res), res,
00878                atomic_read(&res->lr_refcount) - 1);
00879 
00880         ldlm_resource_dump(D_ERROR, res);
00881         unlock_res(res);
00882         return 0;
00883 }
00884 
00892 int ldlm_namespace_cleanup(struct ldlm_namespace *ns, __u64 flags)
00893 {
00894         if (ns == NULL) {
00895                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "NULL ns, skipping cleanup\n");
00896                 return ELDLM_OK;
00897         }
00898 
00899         cfs_hash_for_each_nolock(ns->ns_rs_hash, ldlm_resource_clean,
00900                                  &flags, 0);
00901         cfs_hash_for_each_nolock(ns->ns_rs_hash, ldlm_resource_complain,
00902                                  NULL, 0);
00903         return ELDLM_OK;
00904 }
00905 EXPORT_SYMBOL(ldlm_namespace_cleanup);
00906 
00912 static int __ldlm_namespace_free(struct ldlm_namespace *ns, int force)
00913 {
00914         ENTRY;
00915 
00916         /* At shutdown time, don't call the cancellation callback */
00917         ldlm_namespace_cleanup(ns, force ? LDLM_FL_LOCAL_ONLY : 0);
00918 
00919         if (atomic_read(&ns->ns_bref) > 0) {
00920                 struct l_wait_info lwi = LWI_INTR(LWI_ON_SIGNAL_NOOP, NULL);
00921                 int rc;
00922                 CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE,
00923                        "dlm namespace %s free waiting on refcount %d\n",
00924                        ldlm_ns_name(ns), atomic_read(&ns->ns_bref));
00925 force_wait:
00926                 if (force)
00927                         lwi = LWI_TIMEOUT(msecs_to_jiffies(obd_timeout *
00928                                           MSEC_PER_SEC) / 4, NULL, NULL);
00929 
00930                 rc = l_wait_event(ns->ns_waitq,
00931                                   atomic_read(&ns->ns_bref) == 0, &lwi);
00932 
00933                 /* Forced cleanups should be able to reclaim all references,
00934                  * so it's safe to wait forever... we can't leak locks... */
00935                 if (force && rc == -ETIMEDOUT) {
00936                         LCONSOLE_ERROR("Forced cleanup waiting for %s "
00937                                        "namespace with %d resources in use, "
00938                                        "(rc=%d)\n", ldlm_ns_name(ns),
00939                                        atomic_read(&ns->ns_bref), rc);
00940                         GOTO(force_wait, rc);
00941                 }
00942 
00943                 if (atomic_read(&ns->ns_bref)) {
00944                         LCONSOLE_ERROR("Cleanup waiting for %s namespace "
00945                                        "with %d resources in use, (rc=%d)\n",
00946                                        ldlm_ns_name(ns),
00947                                        atomic_read(&ns->ns_bref), rc);
00948                         RETURN(ELDLM_NAMESPACE_EXISTS);
00949                 }
00950                 CDEBUG(D_DLMTRACE, "dlm namespace %s free done waiting\n",
00951                        ldlm_ns_name(ns));
00952         }
00953 
00954         RETURN(ELDLM_OK);
00955 }
00956 
00966 void ldlm_namespace_free_prior(struct ldlm_namespace *ns,
00967                                struct obd_import *imp,
00968                                int force)
00969 {
00970         int rc;
00971         ENTRY;
00972         if (!ns) {
00973                 EXIT;
00974                 return;
00975         }
00976 
00977         spin_lock(&ns->ns_lock);
00978         ns->ns_stopping = 1;
00979         spin_unlock(&ns->ns_lock);
00980 
00981         /*
00982          * Can fail with -EINTR when force == 0 in which case try harder.
00983          */
00984         rc = __ldlm_namespace_free(ns, force);
00985         if (rc != ELDLM_OK) {
00986                 if (imp) {
00987                         ptlrpc_disconnect_import(imp, 0);
00988                         ptlrpc_invalidate_import(imp);
00989                 }
00990 
00991                 /*
00992                  * With all requests dropped and the import inactive
00993                  * we are gaurenteed all reference will be dropped.
00994                  */
00995                 rc = __ldlm_namespace_free(ns, 1);
00996                 LASSERT(rc == 0);
00997         }
00998         EXIT;
00999 }
01000 EXPORT_SYMBOL(ldlm_namespace_free_prior);
01001 
01007 void ldlm_namespace_free_post(struct ldlm_namespace *ns)
01008 {
01009         ENTRY;
01010         if (!ns) {
01011                 EXIT;
01012                 return;
01013         }
01014 
01015         /* Make sure that nobody can find this ns in its list. */
01016         ldlm_namespace_unregister(ns, ns->ns_client);
01017         /* Fini pool _before_ parent proc dir is removed. This is important as
01018          * ldlm_pool_fini() removes own proc dir which is child to @dir.
01019          * Removing it after @dir may cause oops. */
01020         ldlm_pool_fini(&ns->ns_pool);
01021 
01022         ldlm_namespace_proc_unregister(ns);
01023         cfs_hash_putref(ns->ns_rs_hash);
01024         /* Namespace \a ns should be not on list at this time, otherwise
01025          * this will cause issues related to using freed \a ns in poold
01026          * thread. */
01027         LASSERT(list_empty(&ns->ns_list_chain));
01028         OBD_FREE_PTR(ns);
01029         ldlm_put_ref();
01030         EXIT;
01031 }
01032 EXPORT_SYMBOL(ldlm_namespace_free_post);
01033 
01052 void ldlm_namespace_free(struct ldlm_namespace *ns,
01053                          struct obd_import *imp,
01054                          int force)
01055 {
01056         ldlm_namespace_free_prior(ns, imp, force);
01057         ldlm_namespace_free_post(ns);
01058 }
01059 EXPORT_SYMBOL(ldlm_namespace_free);
01060 
01061 void ldlm_namespace_get(struct ldlm_namespace *ns)
01062 {
01063         atomic_inc(&ns->ns_bref);
01064 }
01065 
01066 /* This is only for callers that care about refcount */
01067 static int ldlm_namespace_get_return(struct ldlm_namespace *ns)
01068 {
01069         return atomic_inc_return(&ns->ns_bref);
01070 }
01071 
01072 void ldlm_namespace_put(struct ldlm_namespace *ns)
01073 {
01074         if (atomic_dec_and_lock(&ns->ns_bref, &ns->ns_lock)) {
01075                 wake_up(&ns->ns_waitq);
01076                 spin_unlock(&ns->ns_lock);
01077         }
01078 }
01079 
01081 void ldlm_namespace_register(struct ldlm_namespace *ns, enum ldlm_side client)
01082 {
01083         mutex_lock(ldlm_namespace_lock(client));
01084         LASSERT(list_empty(&ns->ns_list_chain));
01085         list_add(&ns->ns_list_chain, ldlm_namespace_inactive_list(client));
01086         ldlm_namespace_nr_inc(client);
01087         mutex_unlock(ldlm_namespace_lock(client));
01088 }
01089 
01091 void ldlm_namespace_unregister(struct ldlm_namespace *ns, enum ldlm_side client)
01092 {
01093         mutex_lock(ldlm_namespace_lock(client));
01094         LASSERT(!list_empty(&ns->ns_list_chain));
01095         /* Some asserts and possibly other parts of the code are still
01096          * using list_empty(&ns->ns_list_chain). This is why it is
01097          * important to use list_del_init() here. */
01098         list_del_init(&ns->ns_list_chain);
01099         ldlm_namespace_nr_dec(client);
01100         mutex_unlock(ldlm_namespace_lock(client));
01101 }
01102 
01104 void ldlm_namespace_move_to_active_locked(struct ldlm_namespace *ns,
01105                                           enum ldlm_side client)
01106 {
01107         LASSERT(!list_empty(&ns->ns_list_chain));
01108         LASSERT(mutex_is_locked(ldlm_namespace_lock(client)));
01109         list_move_tail(&ns->ns_list_chain, ldlm_namespace_list(client));
01110 }
01111 
01113 void ldlm_namespace_move_to_inactive_locked(struct ldlm_namespace *ns,
01114                                             enum ldlm_side client)
01115 {
01116         LASSERT(!list_empty(&ns->ns_list_chain));
01117         LASSERT(mutex_is_locked(ldlm_namespace_lock(client)));
01118         list_move_tail(&ns->ns_list_chain,
01119                        ldlm_namespace_inactive_list(client));
01120 }
01121 
01123 struct ldlm_namespace *ldlm_namespace_first_locked(enum ldlm_side client)
01124 {
01125         LASSERT(mutex_is_locked(ldlm_namespace_lock(client)));
01126         LASSERT(!list_empty(ldlm_namespace_list(client)));
01127         return container_of(ldlm_namespace_list(client)->next,
01128                             struct ldlm_namespace, ns_list_chain);
01129 }
01130 
01132 static struct ldlm_resource *ldlm_resource_new(enum ldlm_type ldlm_type)
01133 {
01134         struct ldlm_resource *res;
01135         int idx;
01136 
01137         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR_GFP(res, ldlm_resource_slab, GFP_NOFS);
01138         if (res == NULL)
01139                 return NULL;
01140 
01141         if (ldlm_type == LDLM_EXTENT) {
01142                 OBD_SLAB_ALLOC(res->lr_itree, ldlm_interval_tree_slab,
01143                                sizeof(*res->lr_itree) * LCK_MODE_NUM);
01144                 if (res->lr_itree == NULL) {
01145                         OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(res, ldlm_resource_slab);
01146                         return NULL;
01147                 }
01148                 /* Initialize interval trees for each lock mode. */
01149                 for (idx = 0; idx < LCK_MODE_NUM; idx++) {
01150                         res->lr_itree[idx].lit_size = 0;
01151                         res->lr_itree[idx].lit_mode = 1 << idx;
01152                         res->lr_itree[idx].lit_root = NULL;
01153                 }
01154         }
01155 
01156         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&res->lr_granted);
01157         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&res->lr_converting);
01158         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&res->lr_waiting);
01159 
01160         atomic_set(&res->lr_refcount, 1);
01161         spin_lock_init(&res->lr_lock);
01162         lu_ref_init(&res->lr_reference);
01163 
01164         /* Since LVB init can be delayed now, there is no longer need to
01165          * immediatelly acquire mutex here. */
01166         mutex_init(&res->lr_lvb_mutex);
01167         res->lr_lvb_initialized = false;
01168 
01169         return res;
01170 }
01171 
01178 struct ldlm_resource *
01179 ldlm_resource_get(struct ldlm_namespace *ns, struct ldlm_resource *parent,
01180                   const struct ldlm_res_id *name, enum ldlm_type type,
01181                   int create)
01182 {
01183         struct hlist_node       *hnode;
01184         struct ldlm_resource    *res = NULL;
01185         struct cfs_hash_bd              bd;
01186         __u64                   version;
01187         int                     ns_refcount = 0;
01188 
01189         LASSERT(ns != NULL);
01190         LASSERT(parent == NULL);
01191         LASSERT(ns->ns_rs_hash != NULL);
01192         LASSERT(name->name[0] != 0);
01193 
01194         cfs_hash_bd_get_and_lock(ns->ns_rs_hash, (void *)name, &bd, 0);
01195         hnode = cfs_hash_bd_lookup_locked(ns->ns_rs_hash, &bd, (void *)name);
01196         if (hnode != NULL) {
01197                 cfs_hash_bd_unlock(ns->ns_rs_hash, &bd, 0);
01198                 GOTO(found, res);
01199         }
01200 
01201         version = cfs_hash_bd_version_get(&bd);
01202         cfs_hash_bd_unlock(ns->ns_rs_hash, &bd, 0);
01203 
01204         if (create == 0)
01205                 return ERR_PTR(-ENOENT);
01206 
01207         LASSERTF(type >= LDLM_MIN_TYPE && type < LDLM_MAX_TYPE,
01208                  "type: %d\n", type);
01209         res = ldlm_resource_new(type);
01210         if (res == NULL)
01211                 return ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
01212 
01213         res->lr_ns_bucket = cfs_hash_bd_extra_get(ns->ns_rs_hash, &bd);
01214         res->lr_name = *name;
01215         res->lr_type = type;
01216 
01217         cfs_hash_bd_lock(ns->ns_rs_hash, &bd, 1);
01218         hnode = (version == cfs_hash_bd_version_get(&bd)) ? NULL :
01219                 cfs_hash_bd_lookup_locked(ns->ns_rs_hash, &bd, (void *)name);
01220 
01221         if (hnode != NULL) {
01222                 /* Someone won the race and already added the resource. */
01223                 cfs_hash_bd_unlock(ns->ns_rs_hash, &bd, 1);
01224                 /* Clean lu_ref for failed resource. */
01225                 lu_ref_fini(&res->lr_reference);
01226                 if (res->lr_itree != NULL)
01227                         OBD_SLAB_FREE(res->lr_itree, ldlm_interval_tree_slab,
01228                                       sizeof(*res->lr_itree) * LCK_MODE_NUM);
01229                 OBD_SLAB_FREE(res, ldlm_resource_slab, sizeof *res);
01230 found:
01231                 res = hlist_entry(hnode, struct ldlm_resource, lr_hash);
01232                 return res;
01233         }
01234         /* We won! Let's add the resource. */
01235         cfs_hash_bd_add_locked(ns->ns_rs_hash, &bd, &res->lr_hash);
01236         if (cfs_hash_bd_count_get(&bd) == 1)
01237                 ns_refcount = ldlm_namespace_get_return(ns);
01238 
01239         cfs_hash_bd_unlock(ns->ns_rs_hash, &bd, 1);
01240 
01241         OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_LDLM_CREATE_RESOURCE, 2);
01242 
01243         /* Let's see if we happened to be the very first resource in this
01244          * namespace. If so, and this is a client namespace, we need to move
01245          * the namespace into the active namespaces list to be patrolled by
01246          * the ldlm_poold. */
01247         if (ns_is_client(ns) && ns_refcount == 1) {
01248                 mutex_lock(ldlm_namespace_lock(LDLM_NAMESPACE_CLIENT));
01249                 ldlm_namespace_move_to_active_locked(ns, LDLM_NAMESPACE_CLIENT);
01250                 mutex_unlock(ldlm_namespace_lock(LDLM_NAMESPACE_CLIENT));
01251         }
01252 
01253         return res;
01254 }
01255 EXPORT_SYMBOL(ldlm_resource_get);
01256 
01257 struct ldlm_resource *ldlm_resource_getref(struct ldlm_resource *res)
01258 {
01259         LASSERT(res != NULL);
01260         LASSERT(res != LP_POISON);
01261         atomic_inc(&res->lr_refcount);
01262         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "getref res: %p count: %d\n", res,
01263                atomic_read(&res->lr_refcount));
01264         return res;
01265 }
01266 
01267 static void __ldlm_resource_putref_final(struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
01268                                          struct ldlm_resource *res)
01269 {
01270         struct ldlm_ns_bucket *nsb = res->lr_ns_bucket;
01271 
01272         if (!list_empty(&res->lr_granted)) {
01273                 ldlm_resource_dump(D_ERROR, res);
01274                 LBUG();
01275         }
01276 
01277         if (!list_empty(&res->lr_converting)) {
01278                 ldlm_resource_dump(D_ERROR, res);
01279                 LBUG();
01280         }
01281 
01282         if (!list_empty(&res->lr_waiting)) {
01283                 ldlm_resource_dump(D_ERROR, res);
01284                 LBUG();
01285         }
01286 
01287         cfs_hash_bd_del_locked(nsb->nsb_namespace->ns_rs_hash,
01288                                bd, &res->lr_hash);
01289         lu_ref_fini(&res->lr_reference);
01290         if (cfs_hash_bd_count_get(bd) == 0)
01291                 ldlm_namespace_put(nsb->nsb_namespace);
01292 }
01293 
01294 /* Returns 1 if the resource was freed, 0 if it remains. */
01295 int ldlm_resource_putref(struct ldlm_resource *res)
01296 {
01297         struct ldlm_namespace *ns = ldlm_res_to_ns(res);
01298         struct cfs_hash_bd   bd;
01299 
01300         LASSERT_ATOMIC_GT_LT(&res->lr_refcount, 0, LI_POISON);
01301         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "putref res: %p count: %d\n",
01302                res, atomic_read(&res->lr_refcount) - 1);
01303 
01304         cfs_hash_bd_get(ns->ns_rs_hash, &res->lr_name, &bd);
01305         if (cfs_hash_bd_dec_and_lock(ns->ns_rs_hash, &bd, &res->lr_refcount)) {
01306                 __ldlm_resource_putref_final(&bd, res);
01307                 cfs_hash_bd_unlock(ns->ns_rs_hash, &bd, 1);
01308                 if (ns->ns_lvbo && ns->ns_lvbo->lvbo_free)
01309                         ns->ns_lvbo->lvbo_free(res);
01310                 if (res->lr_itree != NULL)
01311                         OBD_SLAB_FREE(res->lr_itree, ldlm_interval_tree_slab,
01312                                       sizeof(*res->lr_itree) * LCK_MODE_NUM);
01313                 OBD_SLAB_FREE(res, ldlm_resource_slab, sizeof *res);
01314                 return 1;
01315         }
01316         return 0;
01317 }
01318 EXPORT_SYMBOL(ldlm_resource_putref);
01319 
01323 void ldlm_resource_add_lock(struct ldlm_resource *res, struct list_head *head,
01324                             struct ldlm_lock *lock)
01325 {
01326         check_res_locked(res);
01327 
01328         LDLM_DEBUG(lock, "About to add this lock");
01329 
01330         if (ldlm_is_destroyed(lock)) {
01331                 CDEBUG(D_OTHER, "Lock destroyed, not adding to resource\n");
01332                 return;
01333         }
01334 
01335         LASSERT(list_empty(&lock->l_res_link));
01336 
01337         list_add_tail(&lock->l_res_link, head);
01338 }
01339 
01345 void ldlm_resource_insert_lock_after(struct ldlm_lock *original,
01346                                      struct ldlm_lock *new)
01347 {
01348         struct ldlm_resource *res = original->l_resource;
01349 
01350         check_res_locked(res);
01351 
01352         ldlm_resource_dump(D_INFO, res);
01353         LDLM_DEBUG(new, "About to insert this lock after %p: ", original);
01354 
01355         if (ldlm_is_destroyed(new)) {
01356                 CDEBUG(D_OTHER, "Lock destroyed, not adding to resource\n");
01357                 goto out;
01358         }
01359 
01360         LASSERT(list_empty(&new->l_res_link));
01361 
01362         list_add(&new->l_res_link, &original->l_res_link);
01363  out:;
01364 }
01365 
01366 void ldlm_resource_unlink_lock(struct ldlm_lock *lock)
01367 {
01368         int type = lock->l_resource->lr_type;
01369 
01370         check_res_locked(lock->l_resource);
01371         if (type == LDLM_IBITS || type == LDLM_PLAIN)
01372                 ldlm_unlink_lock_skiplist(lock);
01373         else if (type == LDLM_EXTENT)
01374                 ldlm_extent_unlink_lock(lock);
01375         list_del_init(&lock->l_res_link);
01376 }
01377 EXPORT_SYMBOL(ldlm_resource_unlink_lock);
01378 
01379 void ldlm_res2desc(struct ldlm_resource *res, struct ldlm_resource_desc *desc)
01380 {
01381         desc->lr_type = res->lr_type;
01382         desc->lr_name = res->lr_name;
01383 }
01384 
01389 void ldlm_dump_all_namespaces(enum ldlm_side client, int level)
01390 {
01391         struct list_head *tmp;
01392 
01393         if (!((libcfs_debug | D_ERROR) & level))
01394                 return;
01395 
01396         mutex_lock(ldlm_namespace_lock(client));
01397 
01398         list_for_each(tmp, ldlm_namespace_list(client)) {
01399                 struct ldlm_namespace *ns;
01400 
01401                 ns = list_entry(tmp, struct ldlm_namespace, ns_list_chain);
01402                 ldlm_namespace_dump(level, ns);
01403         }
01404 
01405         mutex_unlock(ldlm_namespace_lock(client));
01406 }
01407 
01408 static int ldlm_res_hash_dump(struct cfs_hash *hs, struct cfs_hash_bd *bd,
01409                               struct hlist_node *hnode, void *arg)
01410 {
01411         struct ldlm_resource *res = cfs_hash_object(hs, hnode);
01412         int    level = (int)(unsigned long)arg;
01413 
01414         lock_res(res);
01415         ldlm_resource_dump(level, res);
01416         unlock_res(res);
01417 
01418         return 0;
01419 }
01420 
01425 void ldlm_namespace_dump(int level, struct ldlm_namespace *ns)
01426 {
01427         if (!((libcfs_debug | D_ERROR) & level))
01428                 return;
01429 
01430         CDEBUG(level, "--- Namespace: %s (rc: %d, side: %s)\n",
01431                ldlm_ns_name(ns), atomic_read(&ns->ns_bref),
01432                ns_is_client(ns) ? "client" : "server");
01433 
01434         if (cfs_time_before(cfs_time_current(), ns->ns_next_dump))
01435                 return;
01436 
01437         cfs_hash_for_each_nolock(ns->ns_rs_hash,
01438                                  ldlm_res_hash_dump,
01439                                  (void *)(unsigned long)level, 0);
01440         spin_lock(&ns->ns_lock);
01441         ns->ns_next_dump = cfs_time_shift(10);
01442         spin_unlock(&ns->ns_lock);
01443 }
01444 
01448 void ldlm_resource_dump(int level, struct ldlm_resource *res)
01449 {
01450         struct ldlm_lock *lock;
01451         unsigned int granted = 0;
01452 
01453         CLASSERT(RES_NAME_SIZE == 4);
01454 
01455         if (!((libcfs_debug | D_ERROR) & level))
01456                 return;
01457 
01458         CDEBUG(level, "--- Resource: "DLDLMRES" (%p) refcount = %d\n",
01459                PLDLMRES(res), res, atomic_read(&res->lr_refcount));
01460 
01461         if (!list_empty(&res->lr_granted)) {
01462                 CDEBUG(level, "Granted locks (in reverse order):\n");
01463                 list_for_each_entry_reverse(lock, &res->lr_granted,
01464                                                 l_res_link) {
01465                         LDLM_DEBUG_LIMIT(level, lock, "###");
01466                         if (!(level & D_CANTMASK) &&
01467                             ++granted > ldlm_dump_granted_max) {
01468                                 CDEBUG(level, "only dump %d granted locks to "
01469                                        "avoid DDOS.\n", granted);
01470                                 break;
01471                         }
01472                 }
01473         }
01474         if (!list_empty(&res->lr_converting)) {
01475                 CDEBUG(level, "Converting locks:\n");
01476                 list_for_each_entry(lock, &res->lr_converting, l_res_link)
01477                         LDLM_DEBUG_LIMIT(level, lock, "###");
01478         }
01479         if (!list_empty(&res->lr_waiting)) {
01480                 CDEBUG(level, "Waiting locks:\n");
01481                 list_for_each_entry(lock, &res->lr_waiting, l_res_link)
01482                         LDLM_DEBUG_LIMIT(level, lock, "###");
01483         }
01484 }
01485 EXPORT_SYMBOL(ldlm_resource_dump);
